serial.label: Serial Key
serial.comment: Your can find Serial Key in your account at store.plumrocket.com. For manual click here.

replace_templates.label: Replace Templates
replace_templates.comment: Set "Yes" to replace your customer login/registration template with this extension template and display the social login buttons automatically. Please see our online documentation if you want to keep your own template and install social buttons manually.

enable_for_login.label: Display on Login Form
enable_for_login.comment: Display Social Login buttons on magento customer login form

enable_for_register.label: Display on Registration Form
enable_for_register.comment: Display Social Login buttons on magento customer registration form

validate_ignore.label: Ignore Missing Data from Social Networks
validate_ignore.comment: Many (but not all) social networks share only limited user profile/personal information. If this option is enabled, all required fields in magento that are missing will be pre-filled with temporary data to speed-up the registration process. If this option is set to "No" - the user will be sent to the registration form to enter missing info.

enable_subscription.label: Subscribe Customer To Email Newsletter
enable_subscription.comment: Automatically sign up customer to the Newsletter Subscribers list during the registration

enable_photo.label: Display Customer Photo
enable_photo.comment: Display customer photo from social network in your website header. Please see our online documentation for manual installation instructions if the photo is not shown.

redirect_for_login.label: Login Success Page
redirect_for_login.comment: User will be redirected to this page after each successful login

redirect_for_login_link.label: Login Custom Success Page URL
redirect_for_login_link.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name, to which you will be redirecting.

redirect_for_register.label: Registration Success Page
redirect_for_register.comment: User will be redirected to this page after successful registration

redirect_for_register_link.label: Registration Custom Success Page URL
redirect_for_register_link.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name, to which you will be redirecting.

sortable.comment: Visible buttons will be displayed by default. Hidden buttons will be listed under "show more" section in the front-end.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: Display social share popup after successfull user registration

page.label: Share Page
page.comment: Selected page of your store will be shared on social networks.

page_link.label: Custom Share Page URL
page_link.comment: Please enter the full URL of the page, including the domain name.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to associate their magento account with more than one social network account. Example: user will be able to login to the same store account with Facebook, Google, LinkedIn, etc.

description.label: Description
description.comment: This text will be displayed in customer account -> my social accounts tab as well as in social accounts popup.

enable_popup.label: Enable Popup
enable_popup.comment: If enabled, customers will see a popup window allowing to connect new social network to their magento store account.

timeout.label: Popup Cookie Timeout (days)
timeout.comment: If popup was closed it will be displayed again to the same user in specified number of days. Enter "0" to never display popup again after it was closed first time.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: For configuration instructions, please click here.

enable_birthday.label: Ask for Birthday
enable_birthday.comment: Request customer's birthday date from Facebook

register_btn.label: Registration Button
register_btn.comment: Optional fields. Default images of buttons are provided with extension.

enable.label: Enable
enable.comment: For configuration instructions, please click here.

callbackurl.label: Callback URL
callbackurl.comment: This URL should be used while creating new social login application.
